product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing Limited Stand Up Paddleboard - 12' 6"
long_description: Built with a rich, high-gloss finish and designed for fitness, touring and racing, the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Wing Limited 12 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard offers smooth, easy gliding for large paddlers.
short_description: Built with a rich, high-gloss finish and designed for fitness, touring and racing, the Bic Sport ACE-TEC Wing Limited 12 ft. 6 in. Stand Up Paddleboard offers smooth, easy gliding for large paddlers.
